author: NBC News
title: U.S. Surgeon General on coronavirus: 'This week, it's going to get bad'
description: More states issue stay-at-home orders, the U.K. goes on lockdown and the Team USA's organizing committee calls for Games to be postponed.
content:
Wuhan travel restrictions set to end on April 8
A staff member sprays disinfectant at Wuhan Railway Station on Tuesday.AFP - Getty Images
Travel restrictions in and out of Wuhan, the city in central China where the coronavirus is believed to have originated… [+3027 chars]
